name: Ben H
text: So much better than it used to be. Did not care for the pizza sauce. However, I'm giving Howie's 4 stars because of past experiences. I stopped going for 2 years and decided to give them another chance. My last visit was a 5 star visit

text: I love Hungry Howies because it is like a box of chocolates, You don't know what your going to get. What I mean is every time I order from them I receive a random order which I did not place. Now, this isn't so negative as I do like to try ‚Ä¶More

text: I enjoyed the two topping deep dish. With butter cheese crust. I'll be back.

name: Liz Nicholl
text: Fast and friendly.

name: Nathan Witte
text: Favorite pizza of our 8 year old.

text: Absolutely horrible service. Order pizza for delivery they told us 45 minutes. My wife just called up there after almost two hours, and they said they're just now getting ready to package it. Update- after now waiting over 2 hours for food, ‚Ä¶More

name: LaShanta Downs
text: My first tine here. The staff were very helpful with helping us make a chiloice. We were also given a coupon for 1 free medium pizza. The crust flavors were amazing, so were the asian wings. The pizza overall was slightly bland. I added hot sauce. Will go again. Price was good, place was clean and staff very friendly.

name: Twyla Woodland
text: So i couldnt order on line, well then i would just have to call, i call and listen to a recording of how good there pizza is for 45 min ...sure would've been nice to find out !! If u guys cant do online pizza ordering if there r problems ‚Ä¶More

text: I asked for 16 chicken wings and the delivery driver shows up with chicken nuggets. Store bought pizzas are better and cheaper, a lot cheaper. Their sandwiches are good tho!

name: Matt Hart
text: Never going back. After strike 2 your out. There's too many options. This is a picture of our chz pizza for our son. They didn't even try to compensate me for this. All he said was "I'll talk to the cook"

text: I almost ordered pizza hut but im so glad i didn't. This hit this spot.

text: Their flavor crusts and GF crust are great! Great prices, kids each get their own pies this way. Always fun to try new combos and rewards are easy to come by.

text: The customer service was awesome, my pizza & breadsticks were awesome too!! I highly recommend going here. Very reasonable prices too. I ordered The Works pizza & the Howie bread sticks.

name: Brittany Grater
text: I had a friend who went to this location recently and while he was waiting for his food, he saw it dropped on the floor. Instead of making it over, they picked it up, packaged it, and gave it to him. When he said anything, they said that ‚Ä¶More

text: My roommate and I love this pizza place! Best in Valpo!

name: Melissa Rhodes
text: FAST DELIVERY! WOW! I've eaten there a few times now and the variety and quality of food is great! The staff is always so friendly and seem genuinely happy to work there. Happy employees mean my tummy is happy too! Haha! Oh! My fave when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Taylor Kovach
text: Under new management as of August 2018 and it shows. My food was hot and delicious and more importantly, it was ready on time. Will definitely be making the trip back and forth from Portage just to have Hungry Howies.

name: Joan McPherson
text: Fast and friendly service. Hot and delicious cheesy bread!

name: Dave Laneve
text: Typical cheap low end chain store pizza. On same level as Little Ceasers. Mediocre taste and quality. Pizza Hut and Papa Johns are better. The local places blow this away.  But the prices are good for what you get.

name: Jerry smith
text: Tried this place for the first time after visiting a nearby business. Pizza was very good and so are their prices. So glad I stopped in. I will be back again soon.

name: Edgar Gomez
text: Ok. Didn't really like the pizza. It tasted a little dry.

text: I ordered a pizza here that was supposed to be only cheese with bacon on one half. When I received the pizza I had bacon on the entire thing and no cheese on one half. text: About 4 years ago, IÔ∏è would have given a 5-Star review. Now, IÔ∏è (twice) have ordered a half hour to hour before close. They accept my order and charge me for it. However, nothing gets delivered. IÔ∏è call. They don‚Äôt answer. Repeatedly.  The ‚Ä¶More

name: Ann Frances
text: Lots of options to personalize your pizza, decent cheap pizza

name: victor gamez
text: I went here during a visit in the area. I ordered the pizza online and went to the store just to find out, that whoever took my order did not put it in. So I ended up having to wait longer for my food. I'm mostly bothered that they offered no type of compensation for wasting my time.

name: Bruce Lewis
text: Their website says open till 2am.. I called the first time at 12.... they let the phone ring till they decided to pick up and just hang up. ... so i called back  to them answering really fast to tell me their closed in a really rude tone... ‚Ä¶More

name: Jacob Bristol
text: The best cheap pizza around. It's everything you could ask for.

name: Amanda H
text: I absolutely love the pizza, it's amazing. I am from New Jersey but have lived other places and have ate a lot of pizza I am not impressed with most Indiana pizza places but Hungry Howies has my approval!

name: BattlePope
text: The pizza is fantastic for the price and there's always some kind of deal to be had, whether it be coupons or a holiday promotional offer. Not a big fan of the brownies, and we've ordered them a few times so we just order the pizza but again, fantastic for the price

name: Micah Morgan
text: Excellent food for the price. Food was done quickly. With previous kitchen experience, I was impressed at the cleanliness of the open kitchen!!

name: Region Rat
text: Quality and consistent at affordable prices, try to get out there as often as possible.

name: Qua Wion
text: Great!! We need more locations in the region!!

name: Chris Westmoreland
text: Eh, this place is good enough. Not the best, but it's cheaper than Papa John's. I ate almost an entire pizza to myself, and almost had a gastric emergency. Do not recommend over eating.

name: Matt Bryant
text: I've been a long time customer. It has gone down hill. Sit on hold for 20 min every time I call, and still no one answers. I will go elsewhere. Just called twice in a row, first time waited for 20 min. Called back waited another 10 min, still no answer on a Thursday afternoon at 330 pm.

name: Jeff Zbyrowski
text: A must try pizza very good!!

name: J. Alan Medley
text:
Two words.. Flavor crust!
Its cheap and  tasty!
Better than Pizza Hut..and lil Caesar..

name: Kristi Hanson
text: Because pizza and salad was wanted, ordered from the Valpo location.  It took almost an hour for the order to arrive, there was no croutons and dressing for the salad  and there was no dipping sauce for the rolls.  Eating a dry salad is not fun.
